name: Css Magician Page Builder
author: Presta Magician

sections.description:
No need to be an expert to change your themes settings and add new elements.
With Css Magician, you can update your themes when you want and as you want.
You can add new elements where you want, really where you want (not in predifined posiiton) and you immediatly see the result.

There are 12 free widgets in the basic version and we will add anothers in futures updates :
* Audio
* Button
* Divider
* HTML editor
* Facebook
* Icon
* Simple image
* Google map
* Particles effects
* Spacer
* Title
* Video

And 20 more widgets (therefore 32 in total) in the premium version :

  • Accordion
  • Circular menu
  • Customized countdown
  • Simple countdown
  • Customized counter
  • Counter up
  • SVG counter
  • Facebook comments
  • Facebook like
  • Facebook share
  • Flipbox
  • Flying caracters
  • Image hotspot
  • Image/Text
  • Scrolling text (marquee)
  • Product card
  • Slider
  • SVG
  • Tab
  • Background text

At any time you can go back to your original theme.
And you can create several themes and choose which one to display with a simple clic.

EASU TO USE

No need to be an expert to update your theme as you want.
You can to do the updates without technicals knowledges.

REAL LIVES UPDATES

You do your updates and you immediatly see the result.

ONLY PUBLISH WHEN YOU WANT

You can to do all the updates you want without to publish your work.
Only an admin can to see your work.
And when your work is out, you can to publish your work to show it to your visitors.

MULTILINGUAL

All the new added elements can to be dupplicated and translated in all the languages of your website.

Try Css Magician Premium

You can test the premium version of Css Magician now.

Here is another example of what it is possible to do with Css Magician:

TRANSLATIONS

English
French

Documentation and Support

  • If you have any more questions, visit our support on the Plugin’s Forum.
sections.installation:
1. Install using the WordPress built-in Plugin installer, or Extract the zip file and drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to Css Magician Tab to configure Css Magician
sections.faq:
Do I need a special theme to use Css Magician

No, Css Magician work for all the themes.

Do I need to know how to code to use Css Magician

Absolutely not! Css Magician is a live frontend configurator, editor and page builder. No need to be an advanced user to use it. You can update your theme without to write a line of Css Code.

My site is working with WordPress 3.0, will Css Magician work for me?

No. Css Magician need WordPress 5.0 or greater, and is compatible with PHP 5.6 or greater.
sections.changelog:
1.0.1 – 2020-08-01

  • Added compatibility with WordPress v5.5
  • Added text-transform in stylizer
  • Added text-align in stylizer
  • Added letter-spacing in stylizer
  • Added word-spacing in stylizer
  • Increased Position in stylizer (you can now choose: absolute, fixed,relative, sticky,static, inherit)

1.0.0

  • V.1.0.0: First release

short_description: Css Magician is a Frontend page configurator and page builder that work with all themes.
